All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdvancedCardBoard
Class representing an advanced card in a light way to transmit fewer data as possible
AdvancedCardController
Controller for the advanced card GUI
AdvancedCardInputHandler
Class to handle user input on the CLI for advanced cards.
AdvancedCharacter
An abstract class to represent all the 12 character cards.
AdvancedCharacterType
An enumeration which represent the type of character card.
Assistant
Assistant models the concept of "assistant card" in the game, it is the card you play at the beginning of your turn, its main attributes are cost and possible steps, in fact when you play an assistant its cost determines players turn's order, and possible steps determines the max number of steps you can move Mother nature on the islands.
AssistantCardBoard
Manage visualization of assistant cards in a light way to transmit fewer data as possible
AssistantType
Represents all the assistants types.
BagEmptyException
Custom exception.
BagOfStudents
A class representing the bag of the game.
Bard
Bard - Cost: 1
Bartender
Bartender - Cost: 2
BasicCharacter<T>
A class that model the concept of character in the game: a character is considered a basic character when it has the "color" attribute, its main meaning is to be a father class for more specific classes who use different colors.
CalculatorInfluence
Class used to calculate the player's influence on an island: influence is an integer which depends on towers on islands and students on island whose professor is in the player's game board.
CalculatorTeacherOwnership
A class to manage teacher ownership in the game: if a player has the highest number of students of a specific color on its dining table, player owns the teacher of that specific color
Centaurus
Centaurus - Cost: 3
Character
The class king.
ChooseCloudCardAction
Model the controller action of choosing the cloud card Every "action" card has an override of the perform method, that do a specific controller action based on the name of the class using the corresponding controller method.
Client
Represents a Client.
ClientApp
The class which makes both the CLI and the GUI runnable.
ClientConnection
Interface of a ClientConnection server side.
ClientConnectionStatusHandler
A connection status handler used client-side.
ClientMessageObserverHandler
Observer of all the incoming messages, client side.
CloudCard
An object representing the cloud card in the game: a cloud card contains students drawn from the bag of students
CloudController
Controller for the cloud fxml
ColorCharacter
Object to represent students colors.
ColorTower
Object that represents towers possible colors
CommunicationMessage
Class representing the message object exchanged between clients and server.
CommunicationMessage.MessageType
Enumeration representing all the available message types.
ConnectionStatusHandler
Abstract class of an object which handles the status of the connection (rage-quits, ping failures, casual network errors included).
CustomSwitch
A custom Switch button for graphic purposes.
DeckAssistants
Class to manage assistant distribution to players: each player has the same number of assistants, one for each type, so there are 4 groups of assistants, one for each player's deck.
DeckBoard
Class representing the cards in the hand of a player in a light way to transmit fewer data as possible
DeckType
Represents the magicians on the retro of the assistants cards.
DiningHall
class to manage the group of dining tables the player has: each player has 5 tables and a list of teachers
DiningTable
DiningTable class manages the dining table on the game board: a table contains at max 10 students each having the same color
Entrance
A class to model the entrance of the player's game board: a entrance contains a list of students, that can be received from a cloud card, and can be moved on islands or dining table
Flagman
Flagman - Cost: 3
Game
This object manage the creation and development of the game:
GameAction
Abstract class to create the base for controller actions
GameAction.gameActionID
All the available types of action.
GameBoard
Class representing the game board in a light way to transmit fewer data as possible
GameBoardAdvanced
Class representing the game board in advanced mode in a light way to transmit fewer data as possible
GameBoardController
Handles all the fxml controller coordinates the action and takes care of displaying the update every time they are received
GameController
Class to model the game controller.
GameExpertMode
Class to add expert mode rules to the game model
GamePhase
Enum object to represent game playing phases
GameViewCLI
Represents the CLI.
GameViewClient
 
GameViewClient.InputStateMachine
Class representing all the possible states of the FSM which handles the game phase client-side.
GameViewGUI
GUI Application, launched at the beginning of the game and interfaces the message from the server with the GUI controller
Healer
Healer - Cost: 2
Island
Class that represents the island piece in the game: islands are the places where mother nature can move and students and towers can be placed, an island can be blocked from an advanced character card If two towers of the same color are placed on islands next to each other, that two islands are equivalent to a single island with incremented size
IslandBoard
Class to represent islands in a light way, to transmit as fewer data as possible
IslandController
Controller for the island fxml
Jester
Jester - Cost: 1
Knight
Knight - Cost: 2
Landlord
Landlord - Cost: 3
Lobby
Models a game lobby.
LobbyInfo
A serializable version of the lobby.
Logger
Used for fancy logging in the console with colors :D.
LoginController
The controller for the corresponding Login.fxml file.
Merchant
Merchant - Cost: 3
Monk
Monk - Cost: 1
MotherNature
MotherNature models the Mother nature piece in the game: its function is to determine the island where influence is calculated
MoveMessage
Class to manage messages between model and controller
MoveMotherNatureAction
Model the action to move mother nature Every "action" card has an override of the perform method, that do a specific controller action based on the name of the class using the corresponding controller method.
MoveStudentToDiningHallAction
Model controller action of moving students to dining hall Every "action" card has an override of the perform method, that do a specific controller action based on the name of the class using the corresponding controller method.
MoveStudentToIslandAction
Model the controller action of moving students to islands Every "action" card has an override of the perform method, that do a specific controller action based on the name of the class using the corresponding controller method.
Observable<T>
This class represents an observable object, or "data" in the model-view paradigm.
Observer<T>
A class can implement the Observer interface when it wants to be informed of changes in observable objects.
PingTimeoutExceededTask
A task to be scheduled while waiting for a PING/PONG message respectively client and server side.
PlayAdvancedCardAction
Model the controller action of playing an advanced card.
PlayAssistantCardAction
Model the controller action of play the assistant .
Player
Class to model the player in the game
PlayerBoardController
Controller of the PlayerBoard fxml
PlayerBoardRotatedController
Controller of the PlayerBoard fxml (just a remapping to the PlayerBoardController, needed to create a 90 degree rotated board)
Postman
Postman - Cost: 1
Princess
Princess - Cost: 2
Printable
Contains all the printable symbols and tools used to print the game objects in the CLI.
RemoteGameView
Used by the server as a way to interface the communication coming and going to the client
RotatingBoardController
Controller of RotatingBoard fxml
School
Class to manage the player's full game board
SchoolBoard
/** Class representing the school board in in a light way to transmit fewer data as possible
SchoolController
Controller for the School fxml
Server
Represents the server.
ServerApp
Hello world!
ServerConnectionStatusHandler
A connection status handler used server-side associated to each SocketClientConnection.
SocketClientConnection
Class to manage the connection between client and server and its status.
Student
Student is the class that models the student pieces, it changes its color attribute according to the game rules
Teacher
Teacher is the class that models the concept of teacher in the game, its possible colors are the same as students one
Terrain
An object to represent the game terrain, a terrain is made of islands, cloud cards and advanced characters
TerrainBoard
Class representing the terrain board in a light way to transmit fewer data as possible.
TooManyStudentsException
Custom exception.
Tower
Tower models the tower piece in the game, it inherits color attribute and changes it according to tower piece color in the game
